## Project Summary

**HabitatsConnect** is a modern property management platform similar to Airbnb with:

### Completed
✅ Project structure with Next.js 14
✅ TypeScript configuration
✅ Tailwind CSS with custom gradient fluid theme
✅ Complete type definitions
✅ Zustand state management (Auth, Property, Reservation stores)
✅ Component library (Navbar, PropertyCard, PropertyDetail, Footer, Loading)
✅ Homepage with hero section and featured properties
✅ Authentication pages (Login, Register)
✅ Properties listing page with filters
✅ Property detail page with reservation form
✅ Modern design with fluid colors and dynamic icons
✅ Responsive layout for all devices

### Next Steps
- Install dependencies with npm install
- Configure backend API endpoints
- Set up database connections
- Implement payment system
- Deploy to production

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 + React 18 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS + React Icons
- Zustand for state management
- Modern, fluid UI design
